ISSUE.TITLE: Allow token auth on websocket
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: <!-- Issues are for **concrete, actionable bugs and feature requests** only - if you're just asking for debugging help or technical support, please use: - http://web.libera.chat/?channels=#ansible-awx - https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/awx-project We have to limit this because of limited volunteer time to respond to issues! --> ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea ##### SUMMARY Currently the AWX websocket only works with session auth (login cookie). This prevents being able to use it with token auth. The feature request is to allow token auth to the websocket.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #11151 from sean-m-sullivan/simplify_utils simplify module utils python to single file

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Update websockets.md - specify that the websockets are not meant for external usage/3rd party clients (see #10764) - add a the missing slash at the '/websocket/' URL
